TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Parayapay, title = Parayapay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parayapay} }

S.FORM: Parayapay Itiniay i Luye Cen no Taitung ko Parayapay a niyaro', 162 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 443 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 390 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 53 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 77%, Bunun 2%, roma 8%.

Parayapay Itiniay i Loye Cen no Taitong ko Parayapay a niyaro', 162 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 443 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 88% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 390 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 12% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 53 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 77%, Bonon 2%, roma 8%.
